tit.e: Sei Shonagon Makura no Soshi Sho
Sei Shonagon Makura no Soshi Sho
Sei Shonagon Makura no Soshi Sho

sen.j: 『清少納言枕草紙抄』（せいしょうなごんまくらのそうししょう）は、江戸時代に書かれた『枕草子』の注釈書。
sen.e: "Sei Shonagon Makura no Soshi Sho" is a book written in the Edo Period, commentaries on "Makura no Soshi"(the Pillow Book) written by Sei Shonagon.
"Sei Shonagon Makura no Soshi Sho" is a book written in the Edo Period, commentaries on "Makura no Soshi"(the Pillow Book) written by Sei Shonagon.
"Sei Shonagon Makura no Soshi Sho" is a book written in the Edo Period, commentaries on "Makura no Soshi"(the Pillow Book) written by Sei Shonagon.
The book was published in May 1674.
The book was published in May 1674.
The book was published in May 1674.

sen.j: 『枕草子抄』『磐斎抄』『枕草子万歳抄』とも。
sen.e: The book is also called as " Makura no Soshi Sho", "Bansai Sho" or "Makura no Soshi Bansai Sho".
The book is also called " Makura no Soshi Sho," "Bansai Sho," or "Makura no Soshi Bansai Sho."
The book is also called " Makura no Soshi Sho," "Bansai Sho," or "Makura no Soshi Bansai Sho."

sen.j: 加藤磐斎により著されたと考えられる。
sen.e: The book is thought to have been authored by Bnasai KATO.
The book is thought to have been authored by Bansai KATO.
The book is thought to have been authored by Bansai KATO.
The original texts of Makura no Soshi used in the book are those from Noinbon (a version transcribed from a copy of Makura no Soshi owned by Noin).
The original texts of Makura no Soshi used in the book are those from Noinbon (a version transcribed from a copy of Makura no Soshi owned by Noin).
The original texts of Makura no Soshi used in the book are those from Noinbon (a version transcribed from a copy of Makura no Soshi owned by Noin).

sen.j: 『枕草子』全巻にわたる詳細な注釈としては、現存最古のもの。
sen.e: It is the oldest of the books of detailed commentaries on the whole volumes of Makura no Soshi which have survived to date,
It is the oldest of the books of detailed commentaries on the whole volumes of Makura no Soshi which have survived to date.
It is the oldest of the books of detailed commentaries on the whole volumes of Makura no Soshi which have survived to date.

sen.j: 九州大学所蔵本がインターネット上で公開されている。
sen.e: A copy of this book owned by Kyushu University is posted on the internet.
